languages.text: "Повторите еще раз, почему вы считаете, что Версерианы стоят за заговором против меня?"

traits.locale_text: "Повторите еще раз, почему вы считаете, что Версерианы стоят за заговором против меня?"

languages.text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"
languages.original_text: "Повторите еще раз, почему вы считаете, что Версерианы стоят за заговором против меня?"

traits.locale_text: "Repeat your statement, please — why do you think that the Werserians are behind the conspiracy against me?"
"Repeat your statement, please — why do you think that the Werserians are behind the conspiracy against me?"
"Repeat your statement, please. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot that targeted me?"
"Repeat your statement, please. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot that targeted me?"
"I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"
"I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

languages.text: 「動機をもう一度聞きたい。なぜウェルザリアンが私に陰謀を企てていると思うのだ？」
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: 「動機をもう一度聞きたい。なぜウェルザリアンが私に陰謀を企てていると思うのだ？」

languages.text: “我想再听听你的理由，你为什么认为韦尔森家族打算密谋反对我？”
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: “我想再听听你的理由，你为什么认为韦尔森家族打算密谋反对我？”

languages.text: « Reprenons depuis le début, je vous prie. Qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire que les Werserian sont derrière le complot qui me vise ? »
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: « Reprenons depuis le début, je vous prie. Qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire que les Werserian sont derrière le complot qui me vise ? »

languages.text: «Quiero volver a escuchar su razonamiento. ¿Qué le hace pensar que los Werserian son los responsables del complot contra mi persona?».
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: «Quiero volver a escuchar su razonamiento. ¿Qué le hace pensar que los Werserian son los responsables del complot contra mi persona?».

languages.text: "Ich würde gerne noch einmal Eure Gedanken dazu hören. Wie kommt Ihr darauf, dass die Werserians hinter der Intrige gegen mich stecken?"
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: "Wiederholt Eure Aussage bitte. Wie kommt Ihr darauf, dass die Werserians hinter der Intrige gegen mich stecken?"

languages.text: "İthamlarının dayanaklarını tekrar duymak isterim. Sana bu entrikanın ardında Werserianların olduğunu düşündüren nedir?"
languages.original_text: "I wish to hear your reasoning again. What makes you think the Werserians are behind the plot against me?"

traits.locale_text: "İthamlarının dayanaklarını tekrar duymak isterim. Sana bu entrikanın ardında Werserian hanesinin olduğunu düşündüren nedir?"
